creator: 3D RealityMaps
descriptionHtml:
DISCOVER THE ALPS - THE ONLY APP WITH PHOTOREALISTIC MAPS
The award-winning outdoor app is the perfect tool for planning your next tour and navigating on tour in the Alps. The unique photo-realistic 3D representation of the mountain landscape allows an intuitive, realistic assessment of the terrain and the technical requirements of a tour. There is also a classic topographic map with detailed shading in relief and many practical features that you need for planning and carrying out your next tour. This includes a sophisticated tracking tool, a routing function as well as an one click import of GPX tracks into the 3D map and an offline function.

QUALITY TESTED TOURS
The app offers more than 4,000 hiking, mountain and bike tours from Bergverlag Rother and other partners. The tour description contains all important information regarding requirements and route as well as an elevation profile. So everyone can find suitable tours for their needs. With the help of the GPS function of the smartphone, you can easily follow the marked route of the tours. Getting lost is a thing of the past!
Another highlight is the import of tours in GPX format or from the Komoot app. With one click you can read GPX tours from the Internet into the 3D maps and better estimate the tour in advance.

RECORD TOURS
With the app you can record tours and the distance covered is shown live on the map. Duration, distance, altitude and speed are continuously determined. The tracks are saved on the smartphone. With an Outdoor Guides user account you can save the tracks in the tour cloud, transfer your tracks to other smartphones or tablets and share them with friends.

SIMPLE AND SAFE ORIENTATION ON THE GO
The combination of different map layers and GPS tracking function turns your smartphone into a full navigation device. On tour, your current location is always shown live on the map.

You can switch between 3D view, aerial view and topographic map on a scale of 1: 25,000. So you can find the optimal display for all situations.

Orientation is particularly easy with the help of the unique virtual 360 ° panorama - the 3D map orients itself with the compass and inclinometer exactly as you align your smartphone. This will tell you the names of the peaks, huts and places nearby.

MORE SAFETY IN THE MOUNTAINS
The app also offers an unprecedented level of security. In the photo-realistic 3D map you can read the exposure and nature of the terrain and recognize danger spots. This is not possible with a topographic map!
Since the map shows the real terrain in the highest resolution, it is also possible to orientate yourself in bad weather such as fog or at night. Only the 3D Outdoor Guides app offers this.
Another important security aspect: The 3D map can also be used offline with the app.

FREE BASIC VERSION AND PREMIUM FEATURES
The basic version of the 3D Outdoor Guides App is free of charge. You can explore all region maps and the course of the tours. With the new test subscription, you can use all the functions of the app for one week free of charge. Then you can choose between 3 different premium subscriptions. The subscription runs through the play store and can be canceled there at any time.

FREE TEST SUBSCRIPTION
Benefit now from a 1-week free trial period! When you subscribe for the first time, you get all the functions of the app for one week free of charge.

For questions and tips, visit: https://www.outdoor-guides.de/3d-outdoor-guides-app/
descriptionShort: HE BEST APP FOR HIKERS, BIKERS AND MOUNTAINEERERS IN THE ALPS

With an user account you can save your tracks in your personal cloud, transfer your tracks to other smartphones or tablets and share them with friends.

SIMPLE AND SAFE ORIENTATION ON THE GO
The combination of different map layers and GPS tracking function turns your smartphone into a full navigation device. On tour, your current location is always shown live on the map.

You can switch between 3D view, aerial view and topographic map on a scale of 1: 25,000. So you can find the optimal display for all situations.

Orientation is particularly easy with the help of the unique virtual 360 ° panorama - the 3D map orients itself with the compass and inclinometer exactly as you align your smartphone. This will tell you the names of the peaks, huts and places nearby.

MORE SAFETY IN THE MOUNTAINS
The app also offers an unprecedented level of security. In the photo-realistic 3D map you can read the exposure and nature of the terrain and recognize danger spots. This is not possible with a topographic map! Since the map shows the real terrain in the highest resolution, it is also possible to orientate yourself in bad weather such as fog or at night. Only the RealityMaps app offers this. Another important security aspect: The 3D map can also be used offline with the app.

FREE BASIC VERSION AND PREMIUM FEATURES
The basic version of the App is free of charge. You can explore all region maps and the course of the tours. With the new test subscription, you can use all the functions of the app for one week free of charge. Then you can choose between 3 different premium subscriptions. The subscription runs through the play store and can be canceled there at any time.

FREE TEST SUBSCRIPTION
Benefit now from a 1-week free trial period! When you subscribe for the first time, you get all functions for one week free of charge.

For questions and tips, visit: https://www.realitymaps.app/realitymaps-app/

The unique photo-realistic 3D representation of the mountain landscape allows an intuitive, realistic assessment of the terrain and the technical requirements of a tour. There is also a classic topographic map with detailed shading in relief and many practical features that you need for planning and carrying out your next tour. This includes a sophisticated tracking tool, a routing function as well as an one click import of GPX tracks into the 3D map and an offline function.

REALITYMAPS WINTER<\b>
With the RealityMaps App you now can choose between summer and winter maps. The winter map consists of a 3D topo map with a winter look and with Alps-wide coverage improved by high-resolution aerial photos in choosen areas. And you can find in the app all skiing areas in the Alps as well as the best ski tours!

QUALITY TESTED TOURS
The app offers more than 5,000 hiking, mountain and bike tours from Bergverlag Rother and other partners. The tour description contains all important information regarding requirements and route as well as an elevation profile. So everyone can find suitable tours for their needs. With the help of the GPS function of the smartphone, you can easily follow the marked route of the tours. Getting lost is a thing of the past!
Another highlight is the import of tours in GPX format or from the Komoot app. With one click you can read GPX tours from the Internet into the 3D maps and better estimate the tour in advance.

RECORD TOURS
With the app you can record tours and the distance covered is shown live on the map. Duration, distance, altitude and speed are continuously determined. The tracks are saved on the smartphone. With an user account you can save your tracks in your personal cloud, transfer your tracks to other smartphones or tablets and share them with friends.

SIMPLE AND SAFE ORIENTATION ON THE GO
The combination of different map layers and GPS tracking function turns your smartphone into a full navigation device. On tour, your current location is always shown live on the map.

You can switch between 3D view, aerial view and topographic map on a scale of 1: 25,000. So you can find the optimal display for all situations.

Orientation is particularly easy with the help of the unique virtual 360 ° panorama - the 3D map orients itself with the compass and inclinometer exactly as you align your smartphone. This will tell you the names of the peaks, huts and places nearby.

MORE SAFETY IN THE MOUNTAINS
The app also offers an unprecedented level of security. In the photo-realistic 3D map you can read the exposure and nature of the terrain and recognize danger spots. This is not possible with a topographic map! Since the map shows the real terrain in the highest resolution, it is also possible to orientate yourself in bad weather such as fog or at night. Only the RealityMaps app offers this. Another important security aspect: The 3D map can also be used offline with the app.

FREE BASIC VERSION AND PREMIUM FEATURES
The basic version of the App is free of charge. You can explore all region maps and the course of the tours. With the new test subscription, you can use all the functions of the app for one week free of charge. Then you can choose between 3 different premium subscriptions. The subscription runs through the play store and can be canceled there at any time.

FREE TEST SUBSCRIPTION
Benefit now from a 1-week free trial period! When you subscribe for the first time, you get all functions for one week free of charge.

For questions and tips, visit: https://www.realitymaps.app/realitymaps-app/

The award-winning outdoor app is the perfect tool for planning your next tour and navigating on tour in the Alps. The unique photo-realistic 3D representation of the mountain landscape allows an intuitive, realistic assessment of the terrain and the technical requirements of a tour. There is also a classic topographic map with detailed shading in relief and many practical features that you need for planning and carrying out your next tour. This includes a sophisticated tracking tool, a routing function as well as an one click import of GPX tracks into the 3D map and an offline function.

REALITYMAPS WINTER<\b>
With the RealityMaps App you now can choose between summer and winter maps. The winter map consists of a 3D topo map with a winter look and with Alps-wide coverage improved by high-resolution aerial photos in choosen areas. And you can find in the app all skiing areas in the Alps as well as the best ski tours!

QUALITY TESTED TOURS
The app offers more than 5,000 hiking, mountain and bike tours from Bergverlag Rother and other partners. The tour description contains all important information regarding requirements and route as well as an elevation profile. So everyone can find suitable tours for their needs. With the help of the GPS function of the smartphone, you can easily follow the marked route of the tours. Getting lost is a thing of the past!
Another highlight is the import of tours in GPX format or from the Komoot app. With one click you can read GPX tours from the Internet into the 3D maps and better estimate the tour in advance.

RECORD TOURS
With the app you can record tours and the distance covered is shown live on the map. Duration, distance, altitude and speed are continuously determined. The tracks are saved on the smartphone. With an user account you can save your tracks in your personal cloud, transfer your tracks to other smartphones or tablets and share them with friends.

SIMPLE AND SAFE ORIENTATION ON THE GO
The combination of different map layers and GPS tracking function turns your smartphone into a full navigation device. On tour, your current location is always shown live on the map.

You can switch between 3D view, aerial view and topographic map on a scale of 1: 25,000. So you can find the optimal display for all situations.

Orientation is particularly easy with the help of the unique virtual 360 ° panorama - the 3D map orients itself with the compass and inclinometer exactly as you align your smartphone. This will tell you the names of the peaks, huts and places nearby.

MORE SAFETY IN THE MOUNTAINS
The app also offers an unprecedented level of security. In the photo-realistic 3D map you can read the exposure and nature of the terrain and recognize danger spots. This is not possible with a topographic map! Since the map shows the real terrain in the highest resolution, it is also possible to orientate yourself in bad weather such as fog or at night. Only the RealityMaps app offers this. Another important security aspect: The 3D map can also be used offline with the app.

FREE BASIC VERSION AND PREMIUM FEATURES
The basic version of the App is free of charge. You can explore all region maps and the course of the tours. With the new test subscription, you can use all the functions of the app for one week free of charge. Then you can choose between 3 different premium subscriptions. The subscription runs through the play store and can be canceled there at any time.

FREE TEST SUBSCRIPTION
Benefit now from a 1-week free trial period! When you subscribe for the first time, you get all functions for one week free of charge.

For questions and tips, visit: https://www.realitymaps.app/realitymaps-app/

With the app you can record tours and the distance covered is shown live on the map. Duration, distance, altitude and speed are continuously determined. The tracks are saved on the smartphone. With an user account you can save your tracks in your personal cloud, transfer your tracks to other smartphones or tablets and share them with friends.

SIMPLE AND SAFE ORIENTATION ON THE GO
The combination of different map layers and GPS tracking function turns your smartphone into a full navigation device. On tour, your current location is always shown live on the map.

You can switch between 3D view, aerial view and topographic map on a scale of 1: 25,000. So you can find the optimal display for all situations.

Orientation is particularly easy with the help of the unique virtual 360 ° panorama - the 3D map orients itself with the compass and inclinometer exactly as you align your smartphone. This will tell you the names of the peaks, huts and places nearby.

MORE SAFETY IN THE MOUNTAINS
The app also offers an unprecedented level of security. In the photo-realistic 3D map you can read the exposure and nature of the terrain and recognize danger spots. This is not possible with a topographic map! Since the map shows the real terrain in the highest resolution, it is also possible to orientate yourself in bad weather such as fog or at night. Only the RealityMaps app offers this. Another important security aspect: The 3D map can also be used offline with the app.

FREE BASIC VERSION AND PREMIUM FEATURES
The basic version of the App is free of charge. You can explore all region maps and the course of the tours. With the new test subscription, you can use all the functions of the app for one week free of charge. Then you can choose between 3 different premium subscriptions. The subscription runs through the play store and can be canceled there at any time.

FREE TEST SUBSCRIPTION
Benefit now from a 1-week free trial period! When you subscribe for the first time, you get all functions for one week free of charge.

For questions and tips, visit: https://www.realitymaps.app/realitymaps-app/

title: 3D map - hiking, climbing & bike tours - GPS Navi

creator: 3D RealityMaps
descriptionHtml:
PHOTOREALISTIC 3D MAPS FOR BETTER TRIP PLANNING
The award-winning outdoor navigation app is the perfect tool for planning your next trip and finding your way around. The unique photo-realistic 3D representation of the mountain landscape allows an intuitive, realistic assessment of the terrain and the requirements. Many practical features help you to plan your next trip. These include GPS tracking, a routing function, GPX import into the 3D map and map download for offline use.

MAPS FOR SUMMER & WINTER
The 3D map summer is based on aerial photos with a resolution of 20 cm and a matchless terrain model with a resolution of 60 cm. For winter we provide a 3D relief map with all ski resorts and high-resolution aerial photos for selected regions.

QUALITY-CERTED TOURS DATABASE
The app offers hiking, mountain, ski and bike tours exclusively researched by experts from Bergverlag Rother and other partners. For all tours there is an elevation profile, photos and directions. With the GPS function, you can easily follow the marked route while on tour. A highlight is the import of any tours in GPX format or from Komoot into the 3D map

SIMPLE AND SAFE ORIENTATION ON THE MOVE
With the combination of 3D map, aerial photo and topographical relief map on a scale of 1:25,000, you can perfectly prepare yourself for a trip. With the routing function, you can plan new routes on the 3D map. The GPS tracking function turns your smartphone into a full-fledged navigation device. On tour, your current location is always displayed live on the map. A virtual 360° panorama with information about the surrounding landscape makes it easier for you to find your way around.

RECORD YOUR OWN TRACKS
With the tracking function, you can record your track and display the route covered live on the 3D map. Duration, distance, altitude and speed are continuously determined. With a user account, you can save the recorded tracks in your personal tour cloud, transfer your tracks to other smartphones or tablets and share them with friends.

MORE SAFETY IN THE MOUNTAINS - OFFLINE MAPS
The app offers an unprecedented level of security. In the photo-realistic 3D map you can read the exposure and condition of the terrain and identify danger spots. In bad weather, in fog or at night, you can find your way around as the map depicts the real terrain. Another safety aspect: you can load the maps onto your smartphone for offline use.

EXCLUSIVELY FOR PREMIUM USERS
With a PREMIUM subscription, you can record, save, share and transfer your tracks to other devices, save maps offline on your smartphone, import tours in GPX format and from Komoot, and plan tours in 3D. With the subscription we finance the further development of the app and the creation of the 3D maps. The subscription runs through the store and can be canceled at any time

FREE TRIAL SUBSCRIPTION
With a test subscription you can use all PREMIUM functions for one week free of charge.

For more information visit https://www.realitymaps.app/realitymaps-app/
Terms and Conditions: https://www.realitymaps.app/agb/

title: RealityMaps Outdoor navigation

creator: 3D RealityMaps
descriptionHtml:
OUTDOOR APP FOR PERFECT PLANNING AND ORIENTATION ON THE WAY
The award-winning app is the perfect tool for planning your outdoor activities. The unique, ultra-realistic 3D representation of the mountains allows you to better assess the terrain and inspires new adventures. The app offers many practical features such as GPS tracking of your tours, a route planner for creating your own tours, a GPX import function and a map download for offline use.

MAPS FOR SUMMER & WINTER
Ultra realistic 3D maps based on aerial imagery are currently available for the following regions
- Alps
- Pyrenees
- Balearic Islands
- Canary Islands
- Corsica
- Mt Everest & Himalayas (based on satellite imagery)

Worldwide topographical map with unique 3D relief shading at scale 1:25,000.

QUALITY-CERTED TOURS
The app offers hiking, mountain, ski and bike tours exclusively researched by experts from Bergverlag Rother and other partners. Using the built-in GPS you can easily follow the marked route while on tour. A highlight is the import of any tours in GPX format or from Komoot into the 3D map

SIMPLE AND SAFE ORIENTATION ON THE MOVE
With the combination of 3D map, aerial photo and topographical relief map on a scale of 1:25,000, you can perfectly prepare yourself for a trip. With the routing function, you can plan new routes on the 3D map. The GPS tracking function turns your smartphone into a full-fledged navigation device. On tour, your current location is always displayed live on the map. A virtual 360° panorama with information about the surrounding landscape makes it easier for you to find your way around.

RECORD YOUR OWN TRACKS
With the tracking function, you can record your track and display the route covered live on the 3D map. Duration, distance, altitude and speed are continuously determined. With a user account, you can save the recorded tracks in your personal tour cloud, transfer your tracks to other smartphones or tablets and share them with friends.

MORE SAFETY IN THE MOUNTAINS - OFFLINE MAPS
The app offers an unprecedented level of security. In the photo-realistic 3D map you can read the exposure and condition of the terrain and identify danger spots. In bad weather, in fog or at night, you can find your way around as the map depicts the real terrain. Another safety aspect: you can load the maps onto your smartphone for offline use.

EXCLUSIVELY FOR PREMIUM USERS
With a PREMIUM subscription, you can record, save, share and transfer your tracks to other devices, save maps offline on your smartphone, import tours in GPX format and from Komoot, and plan tours in 3D. With the subscription we finance the further development of the app and the creation of the 3D maps. The subscription runs through the store and can be canceled at any time

FREE TRIAL SUBSCRIPTION
With a test subscription you can use all PREMIUM functions for one week free of charge.

For more information visit https://www.realitymaps.app/realitymaps-app/
Terms and Conditions: https://www.realitymaps.app/agb/

The app offers many practical features such as GPS tracking, a route planner, a GPX import function and map download for offline use.

MAPS FOR SUMMER & WINTER
Our ultra-realistic 3D maps are the most accurate maps on the market. We calculate the 3D maps with innovative technology from aerial and satellite images. Currently there are the following regions
- Alps
- Pyrenees
- Balearic Islands
- Canary Islands
- Corsica
- Mt Everest & Himalaya (Satellite Map)

The app also offers a worldwide topographical map with unique 3D relief shading at a scale of 1:10,000 free of charge.

QUALITY-CERTED TOURS
The app offers hiking, mountain, ski and bike tours exclusively researched by experts from Bergverlag Rother and other partners. Using the built-in GPS you can easily follow the marked route while on tour. A highlight is the import of any tours in GPX format or from Komoot into the 3D map

SIMPLE AND SAFE ORIENTATION ON THE MOVE
With the combination of 3D map, aerial photo and topographical relief map on a scale of 1:25,000, you can perfectly prepare yourself for a trip. With the routing function, you can plan new routes on the 3D map. The GPS tracking function turns your smartphone into a full-fledged navigation device. On tour, your current location is always displayed live on the map. A virtual 360° panorama with information about the surrounding landscape makes it easier for you to find your way around.

RECORD YOUR OWN TRACKS
With the tracking function, you can record your track and display the route covered live on the 3D map. Duration, distance, altitude and speed are continuously determined. With a user account, you can save the recorded tracks in your personal tour cloud, transfer your tracks to other smartphones or tablets and share them with friends.

MORE SAFETY IN THE MOUNTAINS - OFFLINE MAPS
The app offers an unprecedented level of security. In the photo-realistic 3D map you can read the exposure and condition of the terrain and identify danger spots. In bad weather, in fog or at night, you can find your way around as the map depicts the real terrain. Another safety aspect: you can load the maps onto your smartphone for offline use.

EXCLUSIVELY FOR PREMIUM USERS
With a PREMIUM subscription, you can record, save, share and transfer your tracks to other devices, save maps offline on your smartphone, import tours in GPX format and from Komoot, and plan tours in 3D. With the subscription we finance the further development of the app and the creation of the 3D maps. The subscription runs through the store and can be canceled at any time

FREE TRIAL SUBSCRIPTION
With a test subscription you can use all PREMIUM functions for one week free of charge.

For more information visit https://www.realitymaps.app/realitymaps-app/

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have completely revised the 'Plan tour' feature.
First select an activity and plan the tour on the topo map.
You can then display the tour on the 3D map.

You can now also
1.) set waypoints for intermediate destinations
2.) further edit an already planned and saved tour (move / delete waypoints)
3.) select the path condition that should be taken into account when routing

title:
RealityMaps: ski, hike, bike
0.1.9.250217

creator: 3D RealityMaps
descriptionHtml:
RealityMaps Hiking Bike MTB
Best 3D map for challenging outdoor experiences, 3D route planner & tracking

Are you ready for unique outdoor experiences and exciting new places? The RealityMaps app is your perfect companion for challenging adventures – with the most accurate 3D map of all apps.
We create our realistic 3D map from aerial and satellite images using innovative technology. This allows you to accurately assess the terrain and plan your tour with confidence.
Be inspired by over 30,000 verified tours for hiking, biking, mountaineering, or skiing – in Europe's most beautiful mountain regions. Or plan your own routes directly in the 3D map, even off the beaten track.
Additional map information on hiking and biking trails, as well as slope gradient and orientation, will help you with your planning. The app also offers GPS tracking, GPX import, offline maps, and access to more than 5,000 webcams showing current conditions.

VERIFIED TOUR VARIETY
The app offers exclusively hiking, mountain, ski, and bike tours from Bergverlag Rother and other partners, thoroughly researched by experts. With the GPS, you can easily follow the marked routes of the tours.

DETAILED MAP MATERIAL
A topographical map in 2D and 3D complements the 3D map. Additional map layers provide information on hiking and cycling trails, as well as slope gradients and slope orientation.

GREATER SAFETY
The app offers the highest level of safety. The 3D map allows you to see the steepness and condition of the terrain and identify potential hazards. The resolution of the 3D map is so good that you can orient yourself even in bad weather, in fog, or at night.

GPS TRACKING
GPS tracking transforms your smartphone into a fully-fledged navigation device. While on tour, your current location is always displayed live on the 3D map.

PLANNING TOURS
With the routing function, you can plan your own routes directly on the 3D map or the topographic map. You can plan routes along existing paths or a route through pathless terrain to discover unique places.

RECORD AND SHARE YOUR TOURS
With GPS tracking, you can record tours and view the route you've taken live on the 3D map. Duration, distance, elevation, and speed are continuously recorded. Create your personal user account to save the recorded tracks, transfer your tracks to other smartphones or tablets, and share them with friends.

IMPORTING TOURS AS GPX
For unlimited tour variety, you can import tours in GPX format or from Komoot into the 3D map. This puts the entire world of hiking, biking, and mountain tours from the internet at your fingertips.

MAPS FOR SUMMER & WINTER
Global coverage with satellite images. High-resolution 3D map for the entire Alps and Pyrenees (summer & winter), as well as for other selected mountain regions in Europe (summer only).

OFFLINE MAPS
Important for your safety: download selected regions of the 3D map on your smartphone for use without an internet connection.
Try PRO features free for 7 days with no obligation.
Register and try all PRO features free for one week.
- Detailed tour descriptions
- Unlimited tour recording, saving, sharing, and transferring to other devices
- All map layers (2D and 3D, aerial photography and topographic maps, hiking and cycling trails, slope gradient and slope orientation)
- Save the 3D map to your smartphone for offline use
- Plan tours in 3D
- Automatically synchronize self-recorded, planned, and imported tours between the app and the web tour planner

Global coverage with satellite images. High-resolution 3D map for the entire Alps and Pyrenees (summer & winter), as well as for other selected mountain regions in Europe (summer only).

OFFLINE MAPS
Important for your safety: download selected regions of the 3D map on your smartphone for use without an internet connection.
Try PRO features free for 7 days with no obligation.
Register and try all PRO features free for one week.
- Detailed tour descriptions
- Unlimited tour recording, saving, sharing, and transferring to other devices
- All map layers (2D and 3D, aerial photography and topographic maps, hiking and cycling trails, slope gradient and slope orientation)
- Save the 3D map to your smartphone for offline use
- Plan tours in 3D
- Automatically synchronize self-recorded, planned, and imported tours between the app and the web tour planner
